title.narrative: Procurement of Services for Climate Change Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Services for Climate Change Programme) is a component of Climate Change Programme - Jolobayoo-O-Jibon reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,824,335. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, DAI Europe, Harewelle International Limited, ICF Consulting Services Ltd, Met Office. The start date is 02-09-2008 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
